name: Vajramon
description: Vajramon is a black centaur-like ox Digimon covered in gold markings. It has a pair of gold bull horns, and a single, straight gold horn between them. It wears a red cuirass with spaulders which have bonji on them and gold trim, red vambraces with gold trim, a purple belt with three gold buckles over a read plate with gold trim, and red bracers with gold trim on its legs. It carries two swords with their scabbards tied to its belt.
